name: VR Shows Vision Impairment
description: I wrote and produced this video explaining how our virtual reality exhibit was used to obtain a successful settlement after a child's eyesight was significantly impaired by a misdiagnosed brain tumor. We worked with the child's opthamologists to callibrate exactly what the child could see as a result of his condition, and we built an accurate replica of Yankee Stadium to place the user inside. The user could have vision impairments turned on and off to compare, and the exhibit literally made an insurance adjuster cry.

name: Chemical Explosion
description: After we won this case involving a deadly explosion, I interviewed the attorneys who litigated the case and produced this video explaining how our animations helped them demonstrate the brutal devesation their clients suffered, one of whom was burned alive. It's noteworthy to mention that the interview for this video was conducted over teleconference with the attorneys setting up the green screen with our direction.

name: UCLA Leg Amputation
description: This case involved a UCLA lineman who lost his leg in a traffic accident. I produced this marketing video explaining how our Digital Injury Summary helped the attorney drive home the full extent of his client's pain and suffering as his leg was amputed over the course of several complex surgeries. The case resulted in a $35M verdict, and the marketing video resulted in several more clients wanting Digital Injury Summaries.

name: High Impact Official Demo
description: I produced all the official High Impact demo reels, which involved editing together a wide range of animations, illustrations, and interactive presentations that covered several complex subjects in less than two minutes, while maintaining an energetic pace. This demo reel includes all of High Impact's core disciplines: personal injury, traumatic brain injury, product liability, environmental remediation, medical malpractice, birth injury, and accident reconstruction.

name: Syntropy Official Reel
description: Syntropy Studio is the sister-brand of High Impact. Whereas High Impact was focused on accurately visualizing catastrophic events for attorneys, Syntropy served clients in commercial science industries, such as aerospace, medicine, engineering, and more. We basically utilized all the visual/programming talents of High Impact to help manufacturers and other businesses demonstrate and simplify complex science innovation. I produced this demo reel to explain how we do that.

name: Digital Injury Summary
description: I worked with a coworker to produce and record voice-over for this video explaining High Impact's Digital Injury Summary. The Pandemic Tracker displays Covid-19 statistics across the globe. Try it for yourself and see what areas the world are experiencing the biggest impact from the pandemic.
